post_detail.description:
My Contribution:

Acting as user experience lead as well as tech lead on this project, I managed and executed on the creation of wireframes, sitemaps, and user flows. As a tech lead, I oversaw the front-end development and jumped in whenever road blocks were encountered.

Execution:

Clickfire Media was asked by our client, Translation to create a completely new site for the McDonald's All American Games that would act as a framework for all of the content dating back to 1977 on into the future.
post_detail.title: McDonald's All American Games
